bibl.title: Interpreting the Architecture of the temenos: Demotic Papyri and the Cult in Soknopaiou Nesos.
bibl.note: I. Papyri describing the temple's decoration. - II. Ritual texts from Soknopaiou Nesos. - III. Interpretation of the temple's architecture on the basis of the aforementioned texts. [Inv. ST05/256/1369. Demotic oracular question. Second half of the 1st century B.C.] - IV. The cult of Isis at Soknopaiou Nesos. - V. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Martin Andreas Stadler, Interpreting the Architecture of the temenos: Demotic Papyri and the Cult in Soknopaiou Nesos.
Mario Capasso & Paola Davoli (edd.), Soknopaiou Nesos Project. I (2003-2009) = Biblioteca degli ""Studi di Egittologia e di Papirologia"". 9 (Pisa - Roma, 2012) pp. 379-386, 2 figg.

I. Papyri describing the temple's decoration. - II. Ritual texts from Soknopaiou Nesos. - III. Interpretation of the temple's architecture on the basis of the aforementioned texts. [Inv.
